This website host my blog (english language) and other resources. For more information about me, you may also check the following websites:

-   My research group: <https://www.adaptivecontrol.org>

-   The team that hosts my research group: <https://cophyteam.wixsite.com/website-1/>

-   The institute that hosts my team: <https://www.crnl.fr/en?language=en>

-   The European institution that generously funded my group: <https://erc.europa.eu/homepage>

You may also check the website of the [startup](https://robustcircuit.eu/) that I founded a few years ago with my partner-in-crime Daniela Domingues, aka [\@neurodaniela](https://x.com/neurodaniela).
